title: Why Advisors Keep Screwing Up Their Marketing and How to Get it Right
description: "You have to figure out who you are, who you are meant to serve, why you want to serve them and everything else will flow out of that," says Patrick Brewer, president and CMO of WealthSource.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: "You have to figure out who you are, who you are meant to serve, why you want to serve them and everything else will flow out of that," says Patrick Brewer, president and CMO of WealthSource.
